thread.title: Daigneault: Huskies better, but still must improve
thread.title_full: Daigneault: Huskies better, but still must improve

author: Ed Daigneault Republican-American
title: Daigneault: Huskies better, but still must improve
text:
Sunday, October 4, 2015 12:05 AM EDT 
Daigneault: Huskies better, but still must improve By Ed Daigneault Republican-American Connecticut running back Arkeel Newsome (22) carries the ball in the first half during an NCAA college football game against BYU Friday, Oct. 2, 2015, in Provo, Utah. (AP Photo/Rick Bowmer) Browse for Republican American Reprints UConn traveled a long way to provide evidence there is a still a long, long way to go.The proof didn't necessarily lie in the 30-17 defeat at BYU. It didn't necessarily lie in the 309-yard discrepancy in total offense, a number that is far greater than UConn's yardage. That part is disconcerting, but not nearly as troubling as the Huskies' lack of discipline.
